name: PARA-BULL-A
description: PARA-BULL-A is a 4-player cooperative arcade platformer. All four players must time their jumps to avoid falling into a ravine while forming a parabola. It takes five correct parabolas to reach the next stage. Complete all five stages to win the game!  I will soon be releasing this as a free Android app on the Google Play Store as com.PARA_BULL_A.PARA_BULL_A (by developer George V Landon)
